topic: Companies Workflow Series ("IT Companies explorative search")

goals.1: Identify the BGP for obtaining number of employees of a company and other relevant numerical attributes
goals.2: Identify the BGP to retrieve all companies owned by a company
goals.3: Is there some company that owns companies in other countries?
goals.4: Companies have different 'legal forms', compare the number of companies divided in different legal forms
goals.5: Analyze the number of employees  and other relevant numeric attributes
goals.5.1: What are the top-10 companies for a given attribute?
goals.5.2: For which companies is defined some form of income or market capitalization or total assets? What is the min, max, and average in each category and country?
goals.5.3: Which business in each country owns more businesses in other countries?

name: 249f3f57ad

search_workflow.query: SELECT COUNT(*) WHERE { ?p wdt:P17 wd:Q16 . ?p wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . }

search_workflow.narrative:
1. Identify the BGP for obtaining number of employees of a company and other relevant numerical attributes
Find all companies in Canadian Business
search_workflow.query: SELECT ?p ?pname WHERE { ?p wdt:P17 wd:Q16 . ?p wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?p <http://schema.org/name> ?pname . } ORDER BY ASC (?pname) LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?pname WHERE { ?s wdt:P17 wd:Q16 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 ; ?p ?o . ?p <http://schema.org/name> ?pname . } LIMIT 20

search_workflow.narrative:
Chosen different properties from the list above: number of employees, founded by, headquarterslocation,
inception, total revenue, net profit
BGP for obtaining number of employees of a canadian company and other relevant numerical attributes
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?pname ?numEmployees (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?foundername ; separator = ", ") AS ?founders) ?inception ?headquarterslocation ?totalrevenue ?netprofit WHERE { ?p wdt:P17 wd:Q16 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 ; wdt:P1128 ?numEmployees ; wdt:P112 ?founder ; wdt:P571 ?inception ; wdt:P159 ?hql . OPTIONAL { ?p wdt:P2295 ?netprofit } . OPTIONAL { ?p wdt:P2139 ?totalrevenue } . ?p <http://schema.org/name> ?pname . ?founder <http://schema.org/name> ?foundername . ?hql <http://schema.org/name> ?headquarterslocation . } LIMIT 100

search_workflow.narrative:
2. Identify the BGP to retrieve all companies owned by a company
Look for properties linked to companies
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?pname WHERE { ?s ?p ?company . ?company wdt:P17 wd:Q16 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?p <http://schema.org/name> ?pname . } LIMIT 20

search_workflow.narrative:
P127 --> owned by
Find all the companies (case: Canadian companies) owned by a company
(select all the ?c instance of Business to find only companies)
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?companyname ; separator = ", ") AS ?listcompanies) ?ob ?companyn WHERE { ?company wdt:P17 wd:Q16 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?c wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 ; wdt:P127 ?company . ?c <http://schema.org/name> ?companyname . wdt:P127 <http://schema.org/name> ?ob . ?company <http://schema.org/name> ?companyn . } LIMIT 200
output: Carestream Health, Parkdean Resorts, SIG Combibloc GmbH, Tomkins plc
Banco Wiese Sudameris, Scotiabank Perú, Tangerine
Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec
Hudson's Bay, Lord & Taylor, Saks Fifth Avenue, Zellers
Home Outfitters, Hudson's Bay Company, Hudson's Bay Trading Company, Saks Incorporated
TD Ameritrade, TD Auto Finance, TD Canada Trust
Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment, Rogers Hi-Speed Internet, Rogers Plus, Rogers Radio, Rogers Sports & Media
Center Parcs UK, Enwave, GrafTech, PD Ports, Vistra
Breakingviews, Incomes Data Services, Pricing Partners Cie
GNC, Helly Hansen, Nextgen Networks, Shearer's Foods
407 International Inc, Ciel Satellite Group, Marketwire, Oxford Properties
Circle K, Mac's Convenience Stores, Statoil Fuel & Retail
execution_output: 407 International Inc, Ciel Satellite Group, Marketwire, Oxford Properties
Home Outfitters, Hudson's Bay Company, Hudson's Bay Trading Company, Saks Incorporated
Banco Wiese Sudameris, Scotiabank Perú, Tangerine
Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec
Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment, Rogers Hi-Speed Internet, Rogers Plus, Rogers Radio, Rogers Sports & Media
GNC, Helly Hansen, Nextgen Networks, Shearer's Foods
Center Parcs UK, Enwave, GrafTech, PD Ports, Vistra
Circle K, Mac's Convenience Stores, Statoil Fuel & Retail
TD Ameritrade, TD Auto Finance, TD Canada Trust
Carestream Health, Parkdean Resorts, SIG Combibloc GmbH, Tomkins plc
Breakingviews, Incomes Data Services, Pricing Partners Cie
Hudson's Bay, Lord & Taylor, Saks Fifth Avenue, Zellers

search_workflow.narrative:
3. Is there some company that owns companies in other countries?
Using the BGP above on the Canadian company, we try to find companies that owns companies in other country (?country code different from Canadian code wd:Q16)
With '?countryname' it confirms the correct results
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?c ?companyname ?countryname ?ob ?companyn ?cont WHERE { ?c wdt:P127 ?company ; wdt:P17 ?country ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?company wdt:P17 wd:Q16 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?c <http://schema.org/name> ?companyname . ?country <http://schema.org/name> ?countryname . wdt:P127 <http://schema.org/name> ?ob . ?company <http://schema.org/name> ?companyn . wd:Q16 <http://schema.org/name> ?cont . FILTER(?country != wd:Q16) } LIMIT 20

ASK WHERE { ?c wdt:P127 ?company ; wdt:P17 ?country ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?company wdt:P17 wd:Q16 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?c <http://schema.org/name> ?companyname . ?country <http://schema.org/name> ?countryname . wdt:P127 <http://schema.org/name> ?ob . ?company <http://schema.org/name> ?companyn . FILTER(?country != wd:Q16) }

search_workflow.narrative:
4. Companies have different 'legal forms', compare the number of companies divided in different legal forms
Analyzing company properties to find 'legal form'
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?p ?pname WHERE { ?c wdt:P17 wd:Q16 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 ; ?p ?o . ?p <http://schema.org/name> ?pname . FILTER REGEX(?pname, "form") }
SELECT DISTINCT ?lf ?legalform WHERE { ?c wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 ; wdt:P1454 ?lf . ?lf <http://schema.org/name> ?legalform . } LIMIT 10

search_workflow.narrative:
Looking for 'legal form' linked to Business, we find 436 kind of legals forms.
For this motivation can be interesting to analyze only some of these.
We can restrict the Business only for U.K. companies wd:Q145 node
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?lf ?legalform (count(?c) as ?num_companies) WHERE { ?c wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 ; wdt:P17 wd:Q145; wdt:P1454 ?lf . ?lf <http://schema.org/name> ?legalform . } ORDER BY DESC (?num_companies) LIMIT 100

search_workflow.narrative: To find all the legal form with their number of companies (all companies of the world) we can run the code down
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?lf ?legalform (count(?c) as ?num_companies) WHERE { ?c wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 ; wdt:P1454 ?lf . ?lf <http://schema.org/name> ?legalform . } ORDER BY DESC (?num_companies) LIMIT 10

search_workflow.narrative:
5. Analyze the number of employees and other relevant numeric attributes
5.1 What are the top-10 companies for a given attribute?
Choosing wdt:P2295 'netprofit' as attribute we can look for the 10 companies given from U.S.A., U.K and Canada
FROM GIVEN TABLE
wd:Q16	Canada	node
wd:Q145	U.K.	node
wd:Q30	U.S.A.	node
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?compname ?netprofit WHERE { ?comp wdt:P2295 ?netprofit; wdt:P17 ?contry ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?comp <http://schema.org/name> ?compname . ?country <http://schema.org/name> ?countryname . FILTER ((?country = wd:Q16 or ?country = wd:Q145 or ?country = wd:Q30) && isNumeric(?netprofit)) } ORDER BY DESC (?netprofit) LIMIT 10
output: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
execution_output: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?compname ?numEmployees WHERE { ?comp wdt:P1128 ?numEmployees ; wdt:P17 ?contry ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?comp <http://schema.org/name> ?compname . ?country <http://schema.org/name> ?countryname . FILTER ((?country = wd:Q16 or ?country = wd:Q145 or ?country = wd:Q30) && isNumeric(?numEmployees)) } ORDER BY DESC (?numEmployees) LIMIT 10

search_workflow.narrative:
5.2 For which companies is defined some form of income or market capitalization or total assets?
What is the min, max, and average in each category and country?
5.3 Which business in each country owns more businesses in other countries?
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?c ?companyname ?countryname ?ob ?companyn ?cont WHERE { ?c wdt:P127 ?company ; wdt:P17 ?country ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?company wdt:P17 ?co ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?c <http://schema.org/name> ?companyname . ?country <http://schema.org/name> ?countryname . wdt:P127 <http://schema.org/name> ?ob . ?company <http://schema.org/name> ?companyn . ?co <http://schema.org/name> ?cont . FILTER(?country != ?co) } LIMIT 20

search_workflow.narrative: Now I count the businesses owned by a company in another country
search_workflow.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?companyn ?cont (count(?c) as ?owns_num) WHERE { ?c wdt:P127 ?company ; wdt:P17 ?country ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?company wdt:P17 ?co ; wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 . ?c <http://schema.org/name> ?companyname . ?country <http://schema.org/name> ?countryname . ?company <http://schema.org/name> ?companyn . ?co <http://schema.org/name> ?cont . FILTER(?country != ?co) } ORDER BY DESC (?owns_num) LIMIT 20
